Articles.Content:
Inspired by a controversial picture posted by another player gave me the idea to try this. The first few attempts I was able to release all five crafts but unable to keep them close enough to continue flying them all. Eventually I was able to maintain three crafts for a long distance but only able to land two of them but damaged the engines. After landing I went back to the Tracking Station and noticed the Cargo Plane was still available to return to it and I couldn't believe what I found, the craft was still intact!! Then when I thought I had seen it all I tried a takeoff with one of the crafts by applying the brake and giving it full throttle, I knew from previous testing with this craft that it would be almost possible and then to my surprise it worked!!!! This is some of the craziest stuff I have seen and done on KSP.

The Small Crafts look like a cross between a Mig and an F14 Tom Cat so I named them "Tommy Migs" these handle very well

Edited February 26, 2015 by castille7
